ai-patthana24.13:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.13:0.3_0: Transmigration with the cause of precises,
ai-patthana24.13:1.1_0: Experiencing the teaching with the object, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.13:1.1_1: And it is the reason why these three objects have passed away ...
ai-patthana24.13:1.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.13:2.1_0: Not longing for the sake of a teaching, nor for the sake of a condition.
ai-patthana24.13:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
